practice_phrases: Why can't I?
为什么我不能？
Why can't I do that?
为什么我不能做那个？
Why can't I learn new words?
为什么我不能学习新词？
Why can't I see what you were doing?
为什么我不能看到你正在做什么？
Why can't I work hard?
为什么我不能努力工作？
Why can't I change what we're doing?
为什么我不能改变我们正在做的事情？
Why can't I learn something new?
为什么我不能学习新东西？
Why can't I see the answer?
为什么我不能看到答案？
Why can't I learn a lot of new words after we finish?
为什么我不能在我们结束后学习很多新词？
Why can't I hoped to see what you were doing?
为什么我不能希望看到你正在做什么？

seed_context.known: Why can't I remember what you said?
seed_context.target: 为什么我不能记得你说的话？

practice_phrases: I can't remember.
我不能记得。
I can't remember that.
我不能记得那个。
Why can't I remember?
为什么我不能记得？
I can't remember the answer.
我不能记得答案。
I can't remember new words.
我不能记得新词。
Why can't I remember what we're doing?
为什么我不能记得我们正在做的事情？
I can't remember when we learn something new.
我不能记得当我们学习新东西的时候。
Why can't I remember a lot of new words?
为什么我不能记得很多新词？
I can't remember what you were doing after we finish.
我不能记得你正在做什么在我们结束后。
That is why I can't remember we must work hard.
这就是为什么我不能记得我们必须努力工作。

seed_context.known: Why can't I remember what you said?
seed_context.target: 为什么我不能记得你说的话？

practice_phrases: I can't remember.
我不能记得。
Remember that.
记得那个。
Why can't I remember new words?
为什么我不能记得新词？
I can't remember the answer.
我不能记得答案。
We need to remember what we're doing.
我们需要记得我们正在做的事情。
I can't remember that was very interesting.
我不能记得那非常有趣。
Why can't I remember when we learn something new?
为什么我不能记得当我们学习新东西的时候？
I can't remember but we must work hard to learn.
我不能记得但是我们必须努力工作来学习。
We need to remember a lot of new words after we finish.
我们需要记得很多新词在我们结束后。
That is why I can't remember what you were doing.
这就是为什么我不能记得你正在做什么。

seed_context.known: Why can't I remember what you said?
seed_context.target: 为什么我不能记得你说的话？

practice_phrases: What you said.
你说的话。
I can't remember what you said.
我不能记得你说的话。
Why can't I remember what you said?
为什么我不能记得你说的话？
That was very interesting what you said.
那非常有趣你说的话。
I can't remember what you said about new words.
我不能记得你说的话关于新词。
We need to change what you said.
我们需要改变你说的话。
Why can't I remember what you said when we learn?
为什么我不能记得你说的话当我们学习？
That is why I can't remember what you said.
这就是为什么我不能记得你说的话。
I can't remember what you said but that was very interesting.
我不能记得你说的话但是那非常有趣。
We hoped to see what you said after we finish.
我们希望看到你说的话在我们结束后。

seed_context.known: Why can't I remember what you said?
seed_context.target: 为什么我不能记得你说的话？

practice_phrases: What you said.
你说的话。
You said that.
你说那个。
Why can't I remember what you said?
为什么我不能记得你说的话？
I can't remember what you said.
我不能记得你说的话。
That was very interesting what you said.
那非常有趣你说的话。
You said we need to learn new words.
你说我们需要学习新词。
Why can't I remember what you said about new words?
为什么我不能记得你说的话关于新词？
I can't remember what you said when we learn something new.
我不能记得你说的话当我们学习新东西的时候。
Why can't I remember what you said?
为什么我不能记得你说的话？
That is why I can't remember what you said after we finish.
这就是为什么我不能记得你说的话在我们结束后。

seed_context.known: Why can't I remember what you said?
seed_context.target: 为什么我不能记得你说的话？
